title: Ticket #6165: Increase default negotiator socket cache size
description: The negotiator keeps a cache of open connections to the schedds for negotiation. The cache size is fixed (except for prefetching RRLs), and when a new socket is added, the oldest one is closed. The default cache size is 16. This seems way too small. The size can be set via NEGOTIATOR_SOCKET_CACHE_SIZE. The default should be changed to a large number.
